testsuite.name: Gradient Template Test Suite (All device above os 10)

testcase.name: TPAT gesture
testcase.summary: Observe TPAT gesture in report Ad
testcase.preconditions:
1)Play the Ad.

2)Open end card and tap on any button of endcard .

step.actions:
1)Set charles proxy.

2)Start the App.

3)Initialize and Play the Ad.

4)Open end card and tap any part of the end card.

5)Observe reportAd in charles.
step.expectedresults: When a user touch any part of the end-card In reportAd, should see the gesture information attached to "action."

testcase.name: TPAT notification
testcase.summary: Observe TPAT notification in charles
testcase.preconditions: 1)Play the full Ad.

step.actions:
1)Set charles proxy.

2)Start the App.

3)Initialize and Play full Ad.

4)Observe reportAd in charles.
step.expectedresults: Should see "tpat" attributes that send checkpoint 1, 0.25, 0.50, 0.75

testcase.name: Progress Bar Display
testcase.summary: Observe Progress bar on Video
testcase.preconditions: 1)Play the full video Ad .

step.actions:
1)Set charles proxy.

2)Start the App.

3)Initialize and Playfull video Ad .

4)Observe Progress bar on video
step.expectedresults: Video page must display the progress bar. When app is running background, the progress bar should pause.

testcase.name: Progress Bar Display-When app is running background
testcase.summary: Observe Progress bar on Video
testcase.preconditions:
1)Play the Ad.

2)Put the App in background.

step.actions:
1)Set charles proxy.

2)Start the App.

3)Initialize and Play the Ad Put the App in background..

4)Observe Progress bar on video
step.expectedresults: When app is running background, the progress bar should pause.

testcase.name: Vungle Logo
testcase.summary: Observe Vungle Logo
testcase.preconditions: 1)Play the Ad.

step.actions:
1)Start the App.
2)Initialize and Play the Ad.
3)Observe vungle logo on video.
step.expectedresults: Vungle logo should be present at the bottom depending on the orientation of the device and breakpoint.

testcase.name: Close button
testcase.summary: Observe the close button on video
testcase.preconditions: 1)Play the Ad.

step.actions:
1)Start the App.
2)Initialize and Play the Ad.
3)Tap on close botton on video.
step.expectedresults: Ad unit should have close button on video.

testcase.name: CLOSE_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS":"5/4/2
testcase.summary: Manipulate the "CLOSE_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS":"5/4/2" value
testcase.preconditions: Set "CLOSE_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS" parameter value as "5/4/2" in requestAd

step.actions:
1)Set "CLOSE_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS":"5/4/2" value.

2)Start the App.

3)Initialize and Play the Ad.

4)Tap on close button on video.
step.expectedresults: The Close button should show up on the video page after define seconds.

testcase.name: Set Close button value as "0" second
testcase.summary: Manipulate the "CLOSE_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS":"0" value
testcase.preconditions: Set "CLOSE_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS" parameter value as "0" in requestAd

step.actions:
1)Set "CLOSE_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS":"0" value.

2)Start the App.

3)Initialize and Play the Ad.

4)Tap on close button on video.
step.expectedresults: Default value of close button is CLOSE_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS = 0 . Close button should present at all times .

testcase.name: Incentivized Ad
testcase.summary: Check incentivized button functionality on video
testcase.preconditions: Turn on incentivized button from option tab of TestApp

step.actions:
1)Start the App.
2)Turn on incentivized button from option tab of TestApp.
2)Initialize and Play the Ad.
3)Tap on close botton on video.
step.expectedresults:
After clicking close button video should pause and incentivized popup should display on video with below text and buttons:
Text: "Are you sure . you want close the Ad"
buttons:-
a)Close:- Tap on close button And should close.
b)Continue:- Tap on continue button And should resume when it pause.

testcase.name: Incentivized Ad with back button
testcase.summary: Check incentivized Ad with back button
testcase.preconditions: Turn on incentivized button from option tab of TestApp

step.actions:
1)Start the App.
2)Turn on incentivized button from option tab of TestApp.
2)Initialize and Play the Ad.
3)Tap on close botton on video.
4)When Incentivized popup appears on screen, tap on back button of device.
step.expectedresults:
1)When Incentivized popup appears on screen and should pauses.

2)Tap on Back button of device, popup should close and should resumes.

testcase.name: incentivized button on video
testcase.summary: Check incentivized button on video
testcase.preconditions: Turn on incentivized button from option page of TestApp

step.actions:
1)Start the App.
2)Turn on incentivized button from option tab of TestApp.
2)Initialize and Play the Ad.
3)Tap on close botton on video.
4)Tap any where on screen.
step.expectedresults: When Incentivized popup appears on screen, Ad pause. Now tap anywhere on screen. Ad should not resumed.

testcase.name: App Rating
testcase.summary: Check App rating on video
testcase.preconditions: Set "APP_RATING" parameter value as:"http://cdn-lb.vungle.com/templates/defaults/img/4.5-stars.svg" in request Ad

step.actions:
1)Set "APP_RATING" parameter value as:"http://cdn-lb.vungle.com/templates/defaults/img/4.5-stars.svg" in request Ad
2)Start the App.
3)Initialize and Play the Ad.
4)Observe the End card.
step.expectedresults: Should display app rating that is set by "APP_RATING token

testcase.name: Observe for reportAd
testcase.summary: Observe the report Ad
testcase.preconditions: Set charles proxy

step.actions:
1)Set charles proxy.
2)Start the App.
3)Initialize and Play the Ad.
4)Open end card and tap any part of the end card.
5)Observe reportAd in charles.
step.expectedresults: “Ad duration” parameter in reportAd:- when Ad play and Ad experience close by user reportAd is created , In reportAd this parameter show the total value of time duration of Ads.

testcase.name: App Icon
testcase.summary: Observe App Icon
testcase.preconditions: Set "APP_ICON" parameter value as :"http://cdn-lb.vungle.com/templates/defaults/img/app-icon.svg" in request ad

step.actions:
1)Start the App.
2)Initialize and Play the Ad.
3)Open end card .
4)Observe App icon on end card
step.expectedresults: Should display app icon that is set by App _ICON token

testcase.name: App Name/Title
testcase.summary: Observe App Name/Title
testcase.preconditions: Set "APP_NAME parameter value as "Racing Rivals" in request ad

step.actions:
1)Start the App.
2)Initialize and Play the Ad.
3)Open end card 
4)Observe App name on endcard.
step.expectedresults: Should display app name that is set by App name token

testcase.name: App Description
testcase.summary: Observe App Description
testcase.preconditions: Set "APP_DESCRIPTION" parameter value as "Glu example" in request ad

step.actions:
1)Start the App.
2)Initialize and Play the Ad.
3)Open end card 
4)Observe App description
step.expectedresults: Should display app description that is set by App description token

testcase.name: CTA Button
testcase.summary: Observe the CTA button
testcase.preconditions: Set "VIDEO_SHOW_CTA" parameter value as "false"/"true"

step.actions:
1)Start the App.

2)Initialize and Play the Ad.

3)Observe the CTA/download button on video.
step.expectedresults:
1) "false"-->On the video page, the CTA/download button (Download button on the left bottom) should not be visible

2) "true"-->On the video page, the CTA button (Download button on the left bottom) should be visible

testcase.name: DOWNLOAD_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS
testcase.summary: Manipulate the "DOWNLOAD_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS" value
testcase.preconditions: Set "DOWNLOAD_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS" parameter value as "0/2/5" second in requestAd

step.actions:
1)Start the App. 
2)Initialize and Play the Ad.
3)Observe the CTA/download button on video.
step.expectedresults: The CTA button should show up on the video page after define seconds.

testcase.name: Screen Resolution
testcase.summary: Observe Screen resolution of different device
testcase.preconditions: Play the Ad on different device which having small, medium and larger resolution screen

step.actions:
1)Start the App.

2)Initialize and Play the Ad.
step.expectedresults:
For small devices :- >=320px (small devices such as iPhone 4s, 5 & 5S, Galaxy S3/S4)
For medium devices:- >=360px (majority of recent mobile devices such as iPhone 6/6S, Galaxy S5, HTC One)
For Large devices:- >=768 px (majority of tablet devices such as iPad 1st generation, iPad Mini, Galaxy Tab)

testcase.name: Platform-specific Rounder Corners
testcase.summary: Platform-specific Rounder Corners
testcase.preconditions: Platform-specific Rounder Corners

step.actions:
1)Start the App. 
2)Initialize and Play the Ad and open end card
3)Observe the App icon on end card
step.expectedresults: Only for IOS and Android :- Refer following link for this https://vungle.atlassian.net/wiki/display/MRAID/Test+Cases+for+MRAID+Ad+Unit+Templates

testcase.name: CTA requirement
testcase.summary: Check CTA requirement
testcase.preconditions: Set following parameters in request Ad, if Video duration= 30 sec, CLOSE_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS = 5 VIDEO_SHOW_CTA= true , DOWNLOAD_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS = 8/greater than close button delay seconds

step.actions:
1)Set values for CTA and Close button in requestAd.

2)Start the App.

3)Initialize and Play the Ad. and open end card

4)Observe the App icon on end card
step.expectedresults: At the start of video Privacy button should displayed on overlay and aftre 5 sec both CTA and close button should displayed on video.

testcase.name: Carousel image
testcase.summary: Check Carousel image
testcase.preconditions:
Set following parametrs in request Ad
1)CAROUSEL_IMAGE_1,CAROUSEL_IMAGE_2,& CAROUSEL_IMAGE_3 -> must be required in requestAd, 
2)CAROUSEL_IMAGE_4 & CAROUSEL_IMAGE_5 -> are optional

step.actions:
1)Set carousel images values in requestAd.
2)Start the App.
3)Initialize the App and play the Ad and open endcard.
4)Observe carousel images on Endcard.
step.expectedresults:
1)CAROUSEL_IMAGE_1,CAROUSEL_IMAGE_2,& CAROUSEL_IMAGE_3 -> must be required in requestAd, 
2)CAROUSEL_IMAGE_4 & CAROUSEL_IMAGE_5 -> are optional
3)All images should displayed on endcard.

testcase.name: Carousel Position indicator
testcase.summary: Check Carousel Position indicator
testcase.preconditions: Play the Ad and open endcard

step.actions:
1)Start the App.
2)Initialize the App and play the Ad and open endcard
3)Observe carousel position indicator on Endcard.
step.expectedresults: 1) On endcard, three carousel position indicator must be displayed (though all images have values or not)

testcase.name: Token Options at dashboard
testcase.summary:
check For Non-incentivized Ads:-Skip close button

check For incentivized Ads:-Skip close button
testcase.preconditions:
• In dashboard setting Change following parameters:-

1)check a checkbox for Remove user's ability and observe the close button on video

2)check a checkbox for Remove a user's ability to skip an incentivized ad video skip

  • Change Token Values in Charles:

1)"CLOSE_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS":-9999

2)"INCENTIVIZED_CLOSE_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS":-9999

2)Initialize and Play the Ad 
 
3)observe the close button
step.expectedresults:
For Non-incentivized Ads:-Skip close button
For incentivized Ads:-Skip close button

testcase.preconditions: Set "VIDEO_SHOW_CTA" parameter value as "false"/"true"

step.actions:
1)Start the App.

2)Initialize and Play the Ad.

3)Observe the CTA/download button on video.
step.expectedresults:
1) "false"-->On the video page, the CTA/download button (Download button on the left bottom) should not be visible

2) "true"-->On the video page, the CTA button (Download button on the left bottom) should be visible

testcase.name: DOWNLOAD_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS
testcase.summary: Manipulate the "DOWNLOAD_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS" value
testcase.preconditions: Set "DOWNLOAD_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS" parameter value as "0/2/5" second in requestAd

step.actions:
1)Start the App. 
2)Initialize and Play the Ad.
3)Observe the CTA/download button on video.
step.expectedresults: The CTA button should show up on the video page after define seconds.

testcase.name: Screen Resolution
testcase.summary: Observe Screen resolution of different device
testcase.preconditions: Play the Ad on different device which having small, medium and larger resolution screen

step.actions:
1)Start the App.

2)Initialize and Play the Ad.
step.expectedresults:
For small devices :- >=320px (small devices such as iPhone 4s, 5 & 5S, Galaxy S3/S4)
For medium devices:- >=360px (majority of recent mobile devices such as iPhone 6/6S, Galaxy S5, HTC One)
For Large devices:- >=768 px (majority of tablet devices such as iPad 1st generation, iPad Mini, Galaxy Tab)

testcase.name: Platform-specific Rounder Corners
testcase.summary: Platform-specific Rounder Corners
testcase.preconditions: Platform-specific Rounder Corners

step.actions:
1)Start the App. 
2)Initialize and Play the Ad. and open end card
3)Observe the App icon on end card
step.expectedresults: Only for IOS and Android :- Refer following link for this https://vungle.atlassian.net/wiki/display/MRAID/Test+Cases+for+MRAID+Ad+Unit+Templates

testcase.name: Ad video is looped continuously
testcase.summary: Check Ad video is looped continuously
testcase.preconditions: Play the Ad

step.actions:
1)Start the App.

2)Initialize and Play the Ad.

3)Tap on close button after 3/4/5 loops of Ad.
step.expectedresults: Looping video :- Dynamic Interstitial 16:9 must play video infinitely unless a user chooses to exist the ad experience

testcase.name: Inline Video-with TPATS
testcase.summary: Check Inline Video with TPATS
testcase.preconditions: Set charles proxy.

step.actions:
1)Start the App. 
2)Initialize and Play the Ad.
3)Tap on close button after 3/4/5 loops of Ad.
step.expectedresults: At first loop of video :- 1.TPAT should send by breakpoints 0, 25, 50, 75, 100. successful Viewed As sets after watching 80% of a video

testcase.name: Inline Video
testcase.summary: Check reportAd for Inline Video
testcase.preconditions: Set charles proxy.

step.actions:
1)Start the App. 
2)Initialize and Play the Ad.
3)Tap on close button after 3/4/5 loops of Ad.
step.expectedresults: Video Viewed and Video Length events should show in reportAd

testcase.name: Inline Video- incentivizedAd
testcase.summary: Check Inline Video with incentivizedAd
testcase.preconditions: Turn on incentivized option from option page of TestApp

step.actions:
1)Start the App.

2)Initialize and Play the Ad.

3)Tap on close button
step.expectedresults:
1)For incentivizedAd, if user click on close button before watching 80% of a video. Incentivized dialog box should be appear on screen.

2)For incentivizedAd, if user click on close button after watching 80% of a video. Incentivized dialog box should not appear on screen , video should close.

testcase.name: Inline Video-Inline Video after one loop of Ad
testcase.summary: Check Inline Video after one loop of Ad
testcase.preconditions: Play the Ad

step.actions:
1)Start the App.

2)Initialize and Play the Ad.

3)Tap on close button after 3/4/5 loops of Ad.
step.expectedresults:
1)After the first loop of video :-1.Do not collect TPAT events
2)Do not send videoViewed and videoLength events in reportAd
3)No dialog box pops up for incentivizedAd.

testcase.name: Invalid video
testcase.summary: Observe effect of invalid video on template
testcase.preconditions: Set Invalid video instead of actual video.

step.actions:
1)Set Invalid video instead of actual video.

2)Start the App.

3)Initialize and Play the Ad.
step.expectedresults: Invalid Vungle MRAID video Blank screen with end card should be displayed on device

testcase.name: Token Options at dashboard
testcase.summary:
check For Non-incentivized Ads:-Skip close button

check For incentivized Ads:-Skip close button
testcase.preconditions:
• In dashboard setting Change following parameters:-

1)check a checkbox for Remove user's ability and observe the close button on video

2)check a checkbox for Remove a user's ability to skip an incentivized ad video skip

  • Change Token Values in Charles:

1)"CLOSE_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS":-9999

2)"INCENTIVIZED_CLOSE_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS":-9999

step.actions:
1)Start the app 
 
2)Initialize and Play the Ad 
 
3)observe the close button
step.expectedresults:
For Non-incentivized Ads:-Skip close button
For incentivized Ads:-Skip close button

testcase.name: Token Options at dashboard.
testcase.summary:
• check For Non-incentivized Ads:-Skip close button
  • check For incentivized Ads:-close button displays after 5 sec
testcase.preconditions:
• In dashboard setting Change following parameters:-

1)check a checkbox for Remove user's ability and observe the close button on video

2)uncheck a checkbox for Remove a user's ability to skip an incentivized ad video skip

  • Change Token Values in Charles:

1)"CLOSE_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS":-9999

2)"INCENTIVIZED_CLOSE_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS":-5

step.actions:

2)Initialize and Play the Ad

3)observe the close button
step.expectedresults:
• For Non-incentivized Ads:-Skip close button
  • For incentivized Ads:-close button displays after 5 sec

testcase.name: TPAT gesture
testcase.summary: Observe TPAT gesture in report Ad
testcase.preconditions:
1)Play the Ad.

2)Open end card and tap on any button of endcard .

step.actions:
1)Set charles proxy.

2)Start the App.

3)Initialize and Play the Ad.

4)Open end card and tap any part of the end card.

5)Observe reportAd in charles.
step.expectedresults: When a user touch any part of the end-card In reportAd, should see the gesture information attached to "action."

testcase.name: TPAT notification
testcase.summary: Observe TPAT notification in charles
testcase.preconditions: 1)Play the full Ad.

step.actions:
1)Set charles proxy.

2)Start the App.

3)Initialize and Play full Ad.

4)Observe reportAd in charles.
step.expectedresults: Should see "tpat" attribute that send checkpoint 1, 0.25, 0.50, 0.75

testcase.name: Progress Bar Display

testcase.preconditions: 1)Play the full video Ad .

step.actions:
1)Set charles proxy.

2)Start the App.

3)Initialize and Playfull video Ad .

4)Observe Progress bar on video
step.expectedresults: Video page must display the progress bar. When app is running background, the progress bar should pause.

testcase.name: Progress Bar Display-When app is running background

testcase.preconditions:
1)Play the Ad.

2)Put the App in background.

step.actions:
1)Set charles proxy.

2)Start the App.

3)Initialize and Play the Ad Put the App in background..

4)Observe Progress bar on video
step.expectedresults: When app is running background, the progress bar should pause.

testcase.name: Incentivized Ad
testcase.summary: Check incentivized button functionality on video
testcase.preconditions: Turn on incentivized button from option tab of TestApp

step.actions:
1)Start the App.
2)Turn on incentivized button from option tab of TestApp.
2)Initialize and Play the Ad.
3)Tap on close botton on video.
step.expectedresults:
After clicking close button video should pause and incentivized popup should display on video with below text and buttons:
Text: "Are you sure . you want close the Ad"
buttons:-
a)Close:- Tap on close button And should close.
b)Continue:- Tap on continue button And should resume when it pause.

testcase.name: incentivized button on video
testcase.summary: Check incentivized button on video
testcase.preconditions: Turn on incentivized button from option page of TestApp

step.actions:
1)Start the App.
2)Turn on incentivized button from option tab of TestApp.
2)Initialize and Play the Ad.
3)Tap on close botton on video.
4)Tap any where on screen.
step.expectedresults: When Incentivized popup appears on screen,Ad pause. Now tap anywhere on screen. Ad should not resumed.

For small devices :- >=320px (small devices such as iPhone 4s, 5 & 5S, Galaxy S3/S4)
For medium devices:- >=360px (majority of recent mobile devices such as iPhone 6/6S, Galaxy S5, HTC One)
For Large devices:- >=768 px (majority of tablet devices such as iPad 1st generation, iPad Mini, Galaxy Tab)

testcase.name: Check App Description in video container
testcase.summary: check App description and it's contain a text blurb
testcase.preconditions: 1)Play the Ad.

step.actions:

step.expectedresults: App description should contain a text blurb from the app developer describing the game. Usually this text is extracted from the app description within the app store. The content of the description should be limited to 350 characters.

testcase.name: Breakpoint - Portrait view (Check for all breakpoints like small and medium)
testcase.summary: Verify Video Ad in portrait mode
testcase.preconditions: 1)Play the Ad.

step.actions:
1)Start the App.

2)Initialize and Play the Ad.
step.expectedresults:
For Portrait view the template should be divided into two parts:

1. Square video:- The width of the container will depend on the width of the device screen and height will be equal to the width as this is a square video.

2. Scrollable modules:- Below the Square video there should be a scrollable section.

testcase.name: Breakpoint - Landscape view (Check for all breakpoints like small and medium)
testcase.summary: Verify Video Ad in Landscape mode
testcase.preconditions: 1)Play the Ad.

step.actions:
1)Start the App.

2)Initialize and Play the Ad.
step.expectedresults:
For Landscape view the template should be divided into two parts:

1. Square video:- The square video should use the device height for both the height/width of the element bounds.

2. Scrollable modules - The right-hand area should mostly be empty for 50% of the device width (across the majority of devices), but on smaller devices/tablets there may be a crossover.

testcase.name: Large Breakpoint (For Tablet/iPad)
testcase.summary: Verify Video Ad in Large Breakpoint
testcase.preconditions: 1)Play the Ad.

step.actions:
1)Start the App.

2)Initialize and Play the Ad.
step.expectedresults: For large breakpoint the size of the module can be reduced in landscape mode to ensure the majority of the video is in view.

• check For Non-incentivized Ads:-Skip close button
  • check For incentivized Ads:-close button displays after 5 sec

  • For incentivized Ads:-close button displays after 5 sec

testcase.name: Incentivized Ad

3)Tap on close botton on video.
step.expectedresults:

Text: "Are you sure . you want close the Ad"
buttons:-
a)Close:- Tap on close button And should close.
b)Continue:- Tap on continue button And should resume when it pause.

For small devices :- >=320px (small devices such as iPhone 4s, 5 & 5S, Galaxy S3/S4)

For Large devices:- >=768 px (majority of tablet devices such as iPad 1st generation, iPad Mini, Galaxy Tab)

4)Observe the timer

testcase.name: Interactive Video (Quick Time) Medium breakpoint (portrait)
testcase.summary: Functional Test case specific to Template

step.actions:
1)Set charles proxy. 
 
2)Start the App. 
 
3)Initialize and Playfull video Ad 
 
4)Observe Ad template
step.expectedresults:
1)a fullscreen video should play and should pause to allow interaction points at the token values specified.
2)When a user interacts with the video or after the loop count value, the video should continue to play until the end. 
3) Once the video completes,  video should move inside a smaller container to emulate an image which will appear alongside a CTA(I.e. Endcard)
4) Endcard should display to the bottom side of the screen.

testcase.name: Medium breakpoint (portrait)-endcard screen coverage and fullscreen video
testcase.summary: Functional Test case specific to Template
testcase.preconditions: Set up Charles & video,timestamps, App icon, Ratings,CTA App Name values

step.actions:
1)Set charles proxy. 
 
2)Start the App. 
 
3)Initialize and Playfull video Ad 
 
4)Observe Ad template
step.expectedresults:
1)Verify AT the end of the Video, the last frame of the video should get paused and 50% screen should get covered to display the endcard (from bottom)
2)The end card information should move independently to the centre of the screen. The CTA should be the only clickable area for the user to redirect to the app store.

testcase.name: Interactive Video (Quick Time) Medium breakpoint (landscape)
testcase.summary: Functional Test case specific to Template

step.actions:
1)Set charles proxy. 
 
2)Start the App. 
 
3)Initialize and Playfull video Ad 
 
4)Observe Ad template
step.expectedresults:
1)For landscape, the video container should resize its width to 50% of the width of the window and position itself on the left side of the screen. 
2)The green area (containing the CTA) is the only clickable area for the user to redirect to the app store.

1)Play the Ad.

2)Put the App in background.

step.actions:
1)Set charles proxy.

1)Set charles proxy.

2)Start the App.

3)Initialize and Play the Ad Put the App in background..

4)Observe Progress bar on video

2)Start the App.

3)Initialize and Play the Ad Put the App in background..

4)Observe Progress bar on video
step.expectedresults: When app is running background, the progress bar should pause.Video progress should resume from the same point from where the background and foreground action was performed.

testcase.name: Verify Video Progress Bar-When app is running background

testcase.preconditions:
1)Play the Ad.

2)Put the App in background.

step.actions:
1)Set charles proxy.

2)Start the App.

3)Initialize and Play the Ad Put the App in background..

4)Observe Progress bar on video
step.expectedresults:
When app is running background, the progress bar should pause.

Video progress bar should resume from the same point from where the background and foreground action was performed.

Note: Issue exist on all devices.

testcase.name: Interactive Video (Quick Time) Medium breakpoint (portrait)
testcase.summary: Functional Test case specific to Template
testcase.preconditions: Set up Charles & video,timestamps, App icon, Ratings,CTA App Name & other token values

step.actions:
1)Set charles proxy. 
 
2)Start the App. 
 
3)Initialize and Playfull video Ad 
 
4)Observe Ad template
step.expectedresults:
1)a fullscreen video should play and should pause to allow interaction points at the token values specified.
2)When a user interacts with the video or after the loop count value, the video should continue to play until the end. 
3) Once the video completes,  video should move inside a smaller container to emulate an image which will appear alongside a CTA(I.e. Endcard)
4) Endcard should display to the bottom side of the screen.

testcase.name: Medium breakpoint (portrait)-endcard screen coverage and fullscreen video
testcase.summary: Functional Test case specific to Template
testcase.preconditions: Set up Charles & video,timestamps, App icon, Ratings,CTA App Name values

step.actions:
1)Set charles proxy. 
 
2)Start the App. 
 
3)Initialize and Playfull video Ad 
 
4)Observe Ad template
step.expectedresults:
1)Verify AT the end of the Video, the last frame of the video should get paused and 50% screen should get covered to display the endcard (from bottom)
2)The end card information should move independently to the centre of the screen. The CTA should be the only clickable area for the user to redirect to the app store.

testcase.preconditions: ad should get played successfully.

step.actions: 1. Do complete charles set up. 2. Load and play template on device
step.expectedresults: Mute icon desisgn should be as per the specification https://docs.google.com/document/d/1I1z4ofPxQuxRicxMGv0x29uD4szPw2HIxe36IEeqFlE/edit The mute icon positioning should remain within the video container to give user context as to what audio source is being muted/unmuted. The icon should be placed as per the set value for both video type (16:9 & 9:16)

testcase.name: Verify mute/unmute video functionality
testcase.summary: To verify Mute button functionality.
testcase.preconditions: ad should get played successfully.

step.actions: 1. Do complete charles set up. 2. Load and play template on device.
step.expectedresults: Mute icon desisgn should be as per the specification https://docs.google.com/document/d/1I1z4ofPxQuxRicxMGv0x29uD4szPw2HIxe36IEeqFlE/edit When the ad unit is loaded into view, it should display the icon based on the publisher token. The icon remains should be visible for 4 seconds and then fade. If the user taps on the video, the icon should reappears. User should be able to toggle the audio by pressing the icon. After the interaction, icon should fade after 4 secs of inactivity

step.actions: 1. Do complete charles set up. 2. keep App_name as blank in flexview JSON file and then Load and play template on device
step.expectedresults: Verify that app name should not get displayed for null value of app_name token.

testcase.name: To verify when ctaAlwaysVisible is set to true and showOverlayWhen is set to nev
testcase.summary:
---- Warning ----
TestLink Warning
test case name is too long (117 chars) > 100 => has been truncated
Original name
To verify when ctaAlwaysVisible is set to true and showOverlayWhen is set to never then overlay is permanently hidden
---- *** ----
To verify the functionality of the template for the combination of "ctaAlwaysVisible" & "showOverlayWhen".
testcase.preconditions: ad should get played successfully.

step.actions: 1. Do complete charles set up. 2. Load and play template on device
step.expectedresults: Verify that when ctaAlwaysVisible is set to true and showOverlayWhen is set to never. If this is the case then the overlay is permanently hidden and cannot be shown via tapping on the screen.

testsuite.name: MRAID Ad Canvas Experiment Template -IOS
testsuite.details: This suite containes Test case for the MRAID Ad Canvas Experiment Template.

testcase.name: Verify the AD Temaplate Format type
testcase.summary: To verify template format
testcase.preconditions: NA

step.actions: 1. Do complete charles set up. 2. Load and play template on device
step.expectedresults: Ad template should be in following format : View 1: Full-screen video View 2: Endcard( CTA, Close button & privacy icon). [A full-view video is played and after one loop of completion of video/ clicking on close button endcard will be displayed.]

testcase.name: Verify the Video Progress bar is implemented
testcase.summary: To verify the video progress bar.
testcase.preconditions: ad should get played successfully.

step.actions: 1. Do complete charles set up. 2. Load and play template on device
step.expectedresults: The progress bar should be implemented & displayed for the video

testcase.name: Verify Video Progress bar for Colour consistency
testcase.summary: To verify the video progress bar.
testcase.preconditions: ad should get played successfully.

step.actions: 1. Do complete charles set up. 2. Load and play template on device
step.expectedresults: Progress bar should have a background of black color with opacity 0.25 [background: rgba(0,0,0,0.25);], also it should use the values mentioned in Core styling guidelines documet [https://docs.google.com/document/d/1I1z4ofPxQuxRicxMGv0x29uD4szPw2HIxe36IEeqFlE/edit#]. And The video progress bar colour should be consistent with the other Dynamic Template colour scheme.

testcase.name: Verify Video Progress bar is displayed as per the token values.
testcase.summary: To verify the video progress bar.
testcase.preconditions: Set token values for Video progress bar(True/false)

step.actions: 1. Do complete charles set up. 2. Load and play template on device
step.expectedresults: The progress bar should be displayed as per the token value

testcase.name: Verify position of the mute/unmute button
testcase.summary: To verify the mute button position.
testcase.preconditions: ad should get played successfully.

step.actions: 1. Do complete charles set up. 2. Load and play template on device
step.expectedresults:
Mute icon desisgn should be as per the specification https://docs.google.com/document/d/1I1z4ofPxQuxRicxMGv0x29uD4szPw2HIxe36IEeqFlE/edit# The icon positioning should remain within the video container to give user context as to what audio source is being muted/unmuted
The icon should be placed at Top left for both video type (16:9 & 9:16)

testcase.name: Verify mute/unmute video functionality
testcase.summary: To verify Mute button functionality.
testcase.preconditions: ad should get played successfully.

step.actions: 1. Do complete charles set up. 2. Load and play template on device.
step.expectedresults: Mute icon desisgn should be as per the specification https://docs.google.com/document/d/1I1z4ofPxQuxRicxMGv0x29uD4szPw2HIxe36IEeqFlE/edit# The icon remains visible for 4 seconds and then fades to an opacity of 0. If the user taps on the video, the icon reappears (fades into view to an opacity of 1). user can toggle the audio by pressing the icon, once they have interacted the icon will fade to an opacity of 0 after 4 seconds of inactivity.

testcase.name: Verify Privacy icons on various OS
testcase.summary: To verify the privacy pop up
testcase.preconditions: ad should get played successfully.

step.actions: 1. Do complete charles set up. 2. Load and play template on device
step.expectedresults: Privacy icons should always be displayed on the Android, Amazon & Windows device. Privacy icons should not be displayed on IOS devices.

testcase.name: Verify functionality of Privacy bottom
testcase.summary: To verify the privacy pop up
testcase.preconditions: ad should get played successfully.

step.actions: 1. Do complete charles set up. 2. Load and play template on device
step.expectedresults: The Privacy button should always be displayed without delay. When the Privacy button is initially clicked it should show a semi-transparent rectangular box with privacy text and the lock button When a user taps again to visit the URL, user should be taken to the url specified in the "VUNGLE_PRIVACY_URL" token

testcase.name: Verify Privacy Icon with back button of device
testcase.summary: To verify the privacy pop up
testcase.preconditions: ad should get played successfully.

step.actions: 1. Do complete charles set up. 2. Load and play template on device
step.expectedresults: When Privacy pop up is open and user touches back button on a device, user should come back to the ad experience.

testcase.name: Incentivized Ad
testcase.summary: Check incentivized button functionality on video
testcase.preconditions: Turn on incentivized button from option tab of TestApp

step.actions:
1)Start the App.
2)Turn on incentivized button from option tab of TestApp.
2)Initialize and Play the Ad.
3)Tap on close botton on video.
step.expectedresults:
After clicking close button video should pause and incentivized popup should display on video with below text and buttons:
Text: "Are you sure . you want close the Ad"
buttons:-
a)Close:- Tap on close button And should close.
b)Continue:- Tap on continue button And should resume when it pause.

testcase.name: Screen Resolution
testcase.summary: Observe Screen resolution of different device
testcase.preconditions: Play the Ad on different device which having small, medium and larger resolution screen

step.actions:
1) Start the App. 
2) Initialize and Play the Ad.
step.expectedresults:
For small devices :- >=320px (small devices such as iPhone 4s, 5 & 5S, Galaxy S3/S4)
For medium devices:- >=360px (majority of recent mobile devices such as iPhone 6/6S, Galaxy S5, HTC One)
For Large devices:- >=768 px (majority of tablet devices such as iPad 1st generation, iPad Mini, Galaxy Tab)
